
guodong@ubuntu:~$ set -x; CMD="/home/guodong/lmbench-3.0-a9/bin/lat_mem_rd" PARAM="-P 1 4096 64"; for mem_binding in {0..3}; do numactl --physcpubind=0 --membind=$mem_binding $CMD $PARAM; done; set +x;
